exercises.question: Match action to object.
exercises.example_sentence: I eat apple. I drink water.

exercises.question: Match object to action.
exercises.example_sentence: Sit on chair. Sleep in bed.

exercises.question: The bird is in the ___.
exercises.example_sentence: The bird is in the tree.

exercises.question: Match part to action.
exercises.example_sentence: See with eye. Smell with nose.

exercises.question: Match related items.
exercises.example_sentence: Key for box. Phone in bag.

exercises.question: Match clothing to body.
exercises.example_sentence: Socks in shoes. Hat on head.

exercises.question: Match place to item/action.
exercises.example_sentence: Car on street. Walk in park.

exercises.question: Match drink to container.
exercises.example_sentence: Coffee in cup. Water in glass.

exercises.question: The cake is on the ___.
exercises.example_sentence: The cake is on the plate.

exercises.question: Match item to place.
exercises.example_sentence: Cow on farm. Bread at shop.

exercises.question: Match container to tool.
exercises.example_sentence: Plate and spoon. Cup and glass.

exercises.question: Match person to place.
exercises.example_sentence: Doctor at hospital. Family at home.

exercises.question: Match item to place.
exercises.example_sentence: Boat on river. Bicycle at home.

exercises.question: Match related people.
exercises.example_sentence: Baby in family. Doctor and nurse.

exercises.question: Match object to time.
exercises.example_sentence: Sun in day. Moon at night.

exercises.question: Which one is for travel?
exercises.example_sentence: The boat is on the river.

exercises.question: Which one is a body part?
Order the sentence.
exercises.answer: The fish swims in the sea
exercises.example_sentence: The fish swims in the sea.

exercises.question: Match object to time.
exercises.example_sentence: Sun in day. Moon at night.

exercises.question: Order the sentence.
exercises.answer: The bird sits in the tree
exercises.example_sentence: The bird sits in the tree.

exercises.question: Match clothing to body part.
exercises.example_sentence: Shoes on feet. Hat on head.

exercises.question: Match object to food/drink.
exercises.example_sentence: Tea in cup. Cake on plate.

exercises.question: Match opposites.
exercises.example_sentence: Open and close. Sleep and wake.

exercises.question: Match animal to place.
exercises.example_sentence: Bird in sky. Fish in river.
